sn24.9:4.2: “Mendicants, when what exists, because of grasping what and insisting on what, does the view arise:
sn24.9:4.4: “Our teachings are rooted in the Buddha. …”
sn24.9:5.1: “When form exists, because of grasping form and insisting on form, the view arises:
sn24.9:5.5: consciousness exists, because of grasping consciousness and insisting on consciousness, the view arises:
sn24.9:6.1: What do you think, mendicants? Is form permanent or impermanent?”
